item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (614 points | 310 comments)
2. Two new PebbleOS watches (525 points | 200 comments)
3. Show HN: I made a tool to port tweets to Bluesky mantaining their original date (103 points | 33 comments)
4. HTTrack Website Copier (39 points | 8 comments)
5. US appeals court rules AI generated art cannot be copyrighted (102 points | 48 comments)
6. FTC Removes Posts Critical of Amazon, Microsoft, and AI Companies (68 points | discuss)
7. Google to buy Wiz for $32B (252 points | 450 comments)
8. Amazon to kill off local Alexa processing, all voice requests shipped to cloud (136 points | 44 comments)
9. Preview: Amazon S3 Tables and Lakehouse in DuckDB (52 points | 15 comments)
10. Spaceium Inc (YC S24) Is Hiring a Software Engineer ( | hide)
11. The race is on to build the most complex machine (24 points | 11 comments)
12. Designing Electronics That Work (20 points | 2 comments)
13. Fedora 42 Beta (80 points | 32 comments)
14. Rust on the RP2350 (2024) (103 points | 26 comments)
15. Show HN: I made a live multiplayer Minesweeper game (127 points | 54 comments)
16. SheepIt Render Farm server code goes open source (114 points | 16 comments)
17. Extracting DNA from the air – DNA evidence of human occupancy in indoor premises (220 points | 68 comments)
18. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (2022) (583 points | 355 comments)
19. Verification-First Development (5 points | discuss)
20. Stamina Is a Quiet Advantage (95 points | 33 comments)
21. 20 Years of YC / HN (36 points | 8 comments)
22. Show HN: I converted my notebook into a searchable database of IT keywords (38 points | 14 comments)
23. Ask HN: How Do I Escape Homelessness After Rebuilding My Mental Health? (24 points | 6 comments)
24. Jensen Huang – Nvidia GTC 2025 Keynote (43 points | 22 comments)
25. Volkswagen's cheapest EV ever is the first to use Rivian software (21 points | 15 comments)
26. The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance Is a Stone-Cold Masterpiece (164 points | 81 comments)
27. Building AI agents to query your databases (132 points | 49 comments)
28. Sesame CSM: A Conversational Speech Generation Model (90 points | 10 comments)
29. North Korea Launders Billions in Stolen Crypto (94 points | 29 comments)
30. PeerTube v7.1 Is Out (3 points | discuss)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
